data.actual_result: it says "Purger expulsera 1 membre". **The string is correctly translated through i18n and this doesn't happen on Desktop!**
data.expected_result: Should say "Purger expulsera 0 membre" (literally "Pruning will kick 0 members")
data.short_description: In French language, when there are no members to prune, the message on the modal will say "Pruning will kick 1 member [...]" instead of 0.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch language to French - Create a new server (simpler than looking for one where there are no members to prune) - Go to Server Settings > Members > 3dots > Prune - Observe the small message on the modal
